lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Since early 1984, banks have been limited to lending 18 times shareholders' equity and reserves on a consolidated basis and Bundesbank officials have said that interest rate and currency swaps and currency options are under scrutiny.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Nor would it get involved in international competition on minimal regulatory standards in order to shield banks from competitive disadvantages, he said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Authorities favour reinterpreting the banking law to fit present circumstances in order to avoid the long parliamentary political process of changing it, banking sources said.
